properties.description: AgGrid table properties object. See the Ag-Grid docs(https://www.ag-grid.com/documentation/react/getting-started/) for all the table settings API.

height.description: Specify table height explicitly, in pixel.

rowData.description: The list of data to display on the table.

rowId.description: The data field to use in `getRowId` which results in Row Selection being maintained across Row Data changes (assuming the Row exists in both sets). See Ag Grid docs for more details (https://www.ag-grid.com/react-data-grid/data-update-row-data/).

defaultColDef.description: Column properties which get applied to all columns. See all (https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-data-grid/column-properties/).

columnDefs.description: A list of properties for each column.

field.description: The field of the row object to get the cell's data from. Deep references into a row object is supported via dot notation, i.e 'address.firstLine'.

headerName.description: The name to render in the column header. If not specified and field is specified, the field name will be used as the header name.

editable.description: Set to true if this column is editable, otherwise false.

rowDrag.description: Set to true (or return true from function) to allow row dragging.

filter.description: Filter component to use for this column. Set to true to use the default filter.

sortable.description: Set to true to allow sorting on this column.

resizable.description: Set to true to allow this column should be resized.

width.description: Initial width in pixels for the cell.

cellStyle.description: An object of css values returning an object of css values for a particular cell.

cellRenderer.description: Provide your own cell Renderer function (using the `_function` operator) for this column's cells.

valueFormatter.description: A function (using the `_function` operator) or expression to format a value, should return a string. Not used for CSV export or copy to clipboard, only for UI cell rendering.

onCellClick.description: Trigger event when a cell is clicked.

onFilterChanged.description: Trigger event when the filter changes.

onRowClick.description: Trigger event when a row is clicked.

onRowSelected.description: Trigger event when a row is selected.

onSelectionChanged.description: Triggered when the selected rows are changed.

onSortChanged.description: Trigger event when the sort changes.

onCellValueChanged.description: Triggered when a cell value is changed on the grid.

onRowDragEnd.description: Triggered when a row is dragged to another position in the grid.
